title: (x) Baunetz logo - ITC Officina Serif {Dav}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is? It’s very close to _Officina Serif_ but there seems to be slight differences—or maybe it’s just the type treatment (shadow, etc.) that makes it look that way? Thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195449im_/http:/typophile.com/files/baunetz.jpg)

 [‹ hand written "escape To a higher TasTe"](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195449/http:/typophile.com/node/16247 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sky Burial script - Sallando Italic {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195449/http:/typophile.com/node/16174 "Go to next forum topic")
author: goglu

comments.content:
Sure looks like ’Officina’.. _( Seen that ’z’.? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195449/http:/www.formlos.net/)
It **is** ITC Officina Serif Bold. I happen to know the original logo. And i happen to know my typefaces ;-)
Hehe, thank you Erik for the official confirmation :-)
